lines.text: How many shrinks does it take to change a lightbulb?
None. The lightbulb has to want to change itself.
Do you believe in love at first sight?
I don't believe in love, period.
Don't worry, you don't have to thank me.
I wasn't going to. Get over yourself.
Stuck up looneytoones aren't really my thing.
And smart-ass car thieves who have nothing better to do with their time than scam on other people don't really do it for me either.
